mapper.update:
update chl_car_model
vin_code = #{vinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
series_id = #{seriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
sub_series_id = #{subSeriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
displacement = #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
model_year = #{modelYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drive_type = #{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engine = #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
body_structure = #{bodyStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
range_of_service = #{rangeOfService,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
range_of_pickup = #{rangeOfPickup,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
delete_state = #{deleteState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
part_num = #{partNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
called = #{called,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_alias = #{carAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_year = #{carYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dynamic = #{dynamic,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
drives = #{drives,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
seat_num = #{seatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emission_standard = #{emissionStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
configure_level = #{configureLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cylinder = #{cylinder,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
engine_valve_num = #{engineValveNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
transmission = #{transmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
wheelbase = #{wheelbase,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cardoorNum = #{cardoornum,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supply = #{supply,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
inlet = #{inlet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
car_type_id = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
alias_id = #{aliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
tiema = #{tiema,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
json = #{json,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update chl_car_model set vin_code = #{vinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, series_id = #{seriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_series_id = #{subSeriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, displacement = #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_year = #{modelYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drive_type = #{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine = #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, body_structure = #{bodyStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, range_of_service = #{rangeOfService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, range_of_pickup = #{rangeOfPickup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_state = #{deleteState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, part_num = #{partNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, called = #{called,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_alias = #{carAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_year = #{carYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dynamic = #{dynamic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drives = #{drives,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat_num = #{seatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emission_standard = #{emissionStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, configure_level = #{configureLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cylinder = #{cylinder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_valve_num = #{engineValveNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transmission = #{transmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wheelbase = #{wheelbase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardoorNum = #{cardoornum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply = #{supply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inlet = #{inlet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type_id = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alias_id = #{aliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tiema = #{tiema,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, json = #{json,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update chl_car_model set vin_code = #{vinCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_name = #{modelName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, brand_id = #{brandId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, series_id = #{seriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sub_series_id = #{subSeriesId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, displacement = #{displacement,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, model_year = #{modelYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drive_type = #{driveType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine = #{engine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, body_structure = #{bodyStructure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, purchase_price = #{purchasePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, range_of_service = #{rangeOfService,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, range_of_pickup = #{rangeOfPickup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_time = #{createdTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_by = #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, updated_time = #{updatedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delete_state = #{deleteState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, part_num = #{partNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, called = #{called,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_alias = #{carAlias,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_year = #{carYear,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dynamic = #{dynamic,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, drives = #{drives,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seat_num = #{seatNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emission_standard = #{emissionStandard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, configure_level = #{configureLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cylinder = #{cylinder,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, engine_valve_num = #{engineValveNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, transmission = #{transmission,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, wheelbase = #{wheelbase,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cardoorNum = #{cardoornum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, supply = #{supply,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, inlet = #{inlet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, power = #{power,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, car_type_id = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, alias_id = #{aliasId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tiema = #{tiema,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT m.id,m.called,m.purchase_price,m.alias_id,m.tiema,m.car_year,m.vin_code FROM chl_car_model m where m.vin_code=#{vin} order by car_year desc
SELECT m.id,m.called,m.purchase_price,m.alias_id,m.tiema,m.car_year,m.vin_code FROM chl_car_model m where m.alias_id=#{jyid}

SELECT m.id,m.called,m.purchase_price,m.alias_id,m.tiema,m.car_year FROM chl_car_model m INNER JOIN chl_car_model_group g ON m.sub_series_id = g.id INNER JOIN chl_car_model_series s ON s.id = g.vehice_system_id where s.id=#{serid} order by car_year desc
